MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock, affecting properties in Glen Avenue. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a damaged underground cable on Glen Avenue and start excavation work to repair the fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 7am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:27am on 7th January 2021
